products.title: Nitecore MT06MD Torch
products.subtitle: Ideal for examining the area around your pet’s eyes
products.description: Designed for medical professionals, this torch emits a soft, high-CRI light at its lowest setting—perfect for spotting discharge, swelling, or irritation around your pet’s eyes. ⚠️ Avoid shining directly into the eye to prevent discomfort or injury.

products.title: Rex Specs V2 UV Protection
products.subtitle: Many eye conditions are UV-sensitive — Rex Specs offer protection to help
products.description: Protect your pup’s eyes with these high-performance goggles, designed for small breeds. Features include dual UV400-rated lenses (clear and smoke) for full UVA/UVB protection, impact-resistant polycarbonate with ANSI-certified durability, a wraparound visor with foam gasket and breath vents, and adjustable straps that stay in place during activity. Ideal for hiking, biking, beach days, windy rides, or woodland trails.

products.title: Cordless and Waterproof Clippers
products.subtitle: Washable & cordless clippers for safely trimming hair around the eyes
products.description: Low-noise rechargeable clipper — super-portable and waterproof. Convenient for trimming long hair around sensitive areas like the eyes.

products.title: Duracell Optimum AAA Batteries
products.subtitle: Long-lasting power for pen torches and essential tools
products.description: For pen torches and other tools, the Optimum range is always my way to go. They last longer and it's less likely I'll run out of battery while on the job. Reliable power when you need it most — ideal for medical devices and emergency equipment.

products.title: Remend Corneal Repair Gel
products.subtitle: Emergency support for dry, irritated eyes — not a vet substitute
products.description: A veterinary-grade gel containing hyaluronic acid to help soothe and support the cornea in dry or irritated eyes. Safe to use when no immediate vet access is available — for example, when the eye looks very dry. ⚠️ This is not a replacement for professional veterinary diagnosis or treatment.
